text: Ray Rayner (born Raymond M. Rahner; July 23, 1919 - January 21, 2004) was an American television presenter based in Chicago, Illinois. He was born in New York City. He was known for working with WGN-TV and for starring in Ray Rayner and His Friends as Ray and in The Bozo Show as Oliver O. Oliver. Rayner died on January 21, 2004, of complications from pneumonia in Fort Myers, Florida at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Ray Rayner WGN Photo Gallery Chicago Tribune *Ray Raynor - Find A Grave Memorial Category:1919 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Disease- related deaths in Florida Category:American television presenters Category:Television personalities from New York City Category:Television personalities from Chicago
